pages.text: $(weapon)Venomous$() (Poison) inflicts the Poison status effect on enemies you strike!$(br2)Poison deals $(important)damage over time$(), slowly whittling down even the toughest foes.

pages.title: Primary Material
pages.text: $(5)Spider Eye$() grants $(weapon)Venomous +2$()$(br2)Inject venom with every strike!

pages.title: Poison Effects
pages.text: $(li)Level 1: Poison I for 5 seconds$(li)Level 2: Poison II for 5 seconds$(li)Higher levels: Stronger poison (intensity increases)$(br2)$(important)All levels last exactly 5 seconds$() - only the poison intensity changes. Poison brings enemies down to half a heart but cannot kill them.

pages.title: Strategy
pages.text: $(li)Great for tanky enemies$(li)Hit and run tactics$(li)Pair with $(weapon)Execute$() to finish poisoned foes$(li)$(important)Doesn't work$() on undead or poison-immune mobs$(li)Useful in PvP$(br2)$(o)Death by a thousand bites!$()
